cause.description:
i know i like blaring my music till all godly hours of the night and day, what about you? are you sick of having parents and cops and bitchy neighbours get on your case about your music? well me and some friends are! i think anybody should be able to have there music up as loud as they want when ever they want. sure we dont do it all the time but when we want to, oh god watch out cause we get bitched out by everyone, anyone else get that alot? well lets all get together and try to get our way!!!
1. to play our music as loud as we all want!
2. to not get b*tched at when we wana listen to loud tunes!
3. MUSIC IS A F*UCKING RIGHT TO HAVE! so stop ppl from taking that away!
cause.mission: be able to blare our music when ever where ever we want with out getting in trouble by cops and neighbours and who ever else decides to get pissy
